QueryViewSpec.Name: D4 Sponsorships To Cancel Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Used to determine which delinquent sponsorships to terminate.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select s.ID as ID ,sponsor.ID as SPONSORID ,sponsor.LOOKUPID as SPONSORLOOKUPID ,sponsor.NAME as SPONSORNAME ,ie_child.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID as CHILDID ,so.LOOKUPID as CHILDLOOKUPID ,so_child.NAME as CHilDNAME ,i.ID as INTERACTIONID ,i.EXPECTEDDATE ,revschedule.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE from dbo.INTERACTION i join dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY subcat on i.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID = subcat.ID join dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY cat on subcat.INTERACTIONCATEGORYID = cat.ID join dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONCHILDREN ie_child on i.ID = ie_child.INTERACTIONID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = ie_child.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = ie_child.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = ie_child.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT revsplit on s.REVENUESPLITID = revsplit.ID join dbo.REVENUE rev on revsplit.REVENUEID = rev.ID join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE revschedule on revschedule.ID = rev.ID --REVENUE.ID join dbo.CONSTITUENT sponsor on rev.CONSTITUENTID = sponsor.ID join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION se on se.ID = s.ID join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE statusCode on statusCode.ID = se.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID and lower (statusCode.DESCRIPTION) = 'sponsored'
where s.STATUSCODE = 1 -- Active and lower (cat.NAME) = lower ('Sponsorship Delinquency') and lower (subcat.NAME) = lower ('D4 Cancellation Letter') and not exists (select 1 from dbo.CONSTITUENCY constit join dbo.CONSTITUENCYCODE ccode on constit.CONSTITUENCYCODEID = ccode.ID where constit.CONSTITUENTID = i.CONSTITUENTID and lower (ccode.DESCRIPTION) = lower ('Prevent Auto Cancel') and (constit.DATETO is null or constit.DATETO > GETDATE())) and not exists (select 1 from dbo.RECURRINGGIFTACTIVITY rg_act join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONLINEITEM as payment on payment.ID = rg_act.PAYMENTREVENUEID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION as rev_payment on payment.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID = rev_payment.ID where SOURCEREVENUEID = rev.ID and rev_payment.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT > 0 and rev_payment.DATE > i.EXPECTEDDATE) and (case when revschedule.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE > revschedule.ENDDATE then null else revschedule.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE end) <= dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()) - 3, 0)
